short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Michael Esposito Staten Island - Engineer | Machine Learning Enthusiast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the cutting-edge Chrome extension powered by Michael Esposito's AI expertise. 


Elevate your browsing with Michael Esposito's AI mastery. With a BS in Computer Science from the prestigious UC Berkeley, this extension harnesses Michael's deep technical expertise to deliver a truly intelligent and personalised online experience, unlike anything you've encountered before.

Join us and follow the Michael Esposito Chrome Extension to keep up to date with the latest developments in Michael's life and his valuable educational content. Stay informed, be inspired, and be a part of the journey towards a brighter and more sustainable future.
